mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p.* FROM project p WHERE p.project_no IN ( SELECT gp.project_no FROM g_project gp WHERE gp.group_no IN (SELECT groupid FROM members WHERE user_id = #{userId}) ) START WITH p.project_no IN ( SELECT gp.project_no FROM g_project gp WHERE gp.group_no IN (SELECT groupid FROM members WHERE user_id = #{userId}) ) CONNECT BY NOCYCLE PRIOR p.project_no = p.parent_project_no AND p.parent_member_yn = 1 ORDER BY p.project_no
